title: Sunrise sunset
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: This program shows some of the changes currently occurring in local industries, tracing the development of the robot industry and the implications this has had for production costs and changes in job direction. Particular emphasis is on the importance of research and development - ideas and innovations.
